facade

Class CompanyFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.CompanyFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client

    public class CompanyFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements Client
    the class responsible for a company's facade in the coupon system. implements client interface
